definition: leg of air or sea voyage
paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc

sentences.english: Therefore research of flight segment volume forecasting is necessary.
sentences.chinese: 因此航段运量预测的研究是非常必要的。

sentences.english: Refund for partial unused tickets will be entertained after deducting OW net fare.
sentences.chinese: 未使用部分航段的机票退票时将扣除单程净价。

sentences.english: Travel service provider must review booking constantly and cancel all unwanted segments promptly.
sentences.chinese: 代理人应定期查看预订记录，及时取消不需要的航段。

definition: air or sea voyage (seen as an individual, countable item)/flight/voyage/CL:個|个[ge4]
scheduled flight/flight number/plane/scheduled sailing/sailing number/passenger ship
connected by air, sea traffic or service
to return to the point of departure
(of an airline) to run a flight
home port (of a ship or fleet)
